original: śrīdevī uvāca
analyzed: śrī devī uvāca

original: anuttaraṃ kathaṃ deva sadyaḥkaulikasiddhidam /
analyzed: anuttaram katham deva sadyas kaulika siddhi dam

original: yena vijñātamātreṇa khecarīsamatāṃ vrajet // ParTri_1 //
analyzed: yena vijñāta mātreṇa khecarī sama tām vrajet

original: etad guhyaṃ mahāguhyaṃ kathayasva mama prabho /
analyzed: etat guhyam mahā guhyam kathayasva mama prabho

original: hṛdayasthā tu yā śaktiḥ kaulinī kulanāyikā // ParTri_2 //
analyzed: hṛdaya sthā tu yā śaktiḥ kaulinī kula nāyikā

original: tāṃ me kathaya deveśa yena tṛptiṃ labhāmy aham /
analyzed: tām me kathaya deveśa yena tṛptim labhāmi aham

original: śrībhairava uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhairavaḥ uvāca

original: śṛṇu devi mahābhage uttarasyāpy anuttaram // ParTri_3 //
analyzed: śṛṇu devi mahābhage uttarasya api anuttaram

original: yad ayaṃ kauliko vidhir mama hṛdvyomny avasthitaḥ /
analyzed: yat ayam kaulikaḥ vidhiḥ mama hṛd vyomni avasthitaḥ

original: kathayāmi na saṃdehaḥ sadyaḥ kaulikasiddhidam // ParTri_4 //
analyzed: kathayāmi na saṃdehaḥ sadyas kaulika siddhi dam

original: athādyās tithayaḥ sarve svarā bindvavasānakāḥ /
analyzed: atha ādyāḥ tithayaḥ sarve svarāḥ bindu avasānakāḥ

original: tadantaḥ kālayogena somasūryau prakīrtitau // ParTri_5 //
analyzed: tad antaḥ kāla yogena soma sūryau prakīrtitau

original: pṛthivyādīni tattvāni puruṣāntāni pañcasu /
analyzed: pṛthivī ādīni tattvāni puruṣa antāni pañcasu

original: kramāt kādiṣu vargeṣu makārānteṣu suvrate // ParTri_6 //
analyzed: kramāt kādiṣu vargeṣu makāra anteṣu suvrate

original: vāyvagnisalilendrāṇāṃ dhāraṇānāṃ catuṣṭayam /
analyzed: vāyu agni salila indrāṇām dhāraṇānām catuṣṭayam

original: tadūrdhve śādivikhyātaṃ purastād brahmapañcakam // ParTri_7 //
analyzed: tad ūrdhve śādi vikhyātam purastāt brahmapañcakam

original: [var. 7cd: ūrdvhaṃ]
analyzed: var c ūrdvham

original: amūlā tatkramā jñeyā kṣāntā sṛṣṭir udāhṛtā /
sarveṣāṃ caiva mantrāṇāṃ vidyānāṃ ca yaśasvini // ParTri_8 //
analyzed: sarveṣām ca eva mantrāṇām vidyānām ca yaśasvini

original: iyaṃ yoniḥ samākhyātā sarvatantreṣu sarvadā /
analyzed: iyam yoniḥ samākhyātā sarva tantreṣu sarvadā

original: caturdaśayutaṃ bhadre tithīśāntasamanvitam // ParTri_9 //
analyzed: caturdaśa yutam bhadre tithi īśa anta samanvitam

original: tṛtīyam brahma suśroṇi hṛdayam bhairavātmanaḥ /
analyzed: tṛtīyam brahma suśroṇi hṛdayam bhairava ātmanaḥ

original: etan nāyoginījāto nārudro labhate sphuṭam // ParTri_10 //
analyzed: etat na a yoginī jātaḥ na a rudraḥ labhate sphuṭam

original: hṛdayaṃ devadevasya sadyo yogavimokṣadam /
analyzed: hṛdayam devadevasya sadyas yoga vimokṣa dam

original: asyoccāre kṛte samyaṅ mantramudrāgaṇo mahān // ParTri_11 //
analyzed: asya uccāre kṛte samyak mantra mudrā gaṇaḥ mahān

original: sadyas tanmukhatām eti svadehāveśalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: sadyas tad mukha tām eti sva deha āveśa lakṣaṇam

original: muhūrtaṃ smarate yas tu cumbakenābhimudritaḥ // ParTri_12 //
analyzed: muhūrtam smarate yaḥ tu cumbakena abhimudritaḥ

original: sa badhnāti tadā dehaṃ mantramudrāgaṇaṃ naraḥ /
analyzed: sa badhnāti tadā deham mantra mudrā gaṇam naraḥ

original: atītānāgatānarthān pṛṣṭo 'sau kathayaty api // ParTri_13 //
analyzed: atīta an āgata an arthān pṛṣṭaḥ sau kathayati api

original: praharād yad abhipretaṃ devatārūpam uccaran /
analyzed: praharāt yat abhipretam devatā rūpam uccaran

original: sakṣāt paśyaty asaṃdigdham ākṛṣṭaṃ rudraśaktibhiḥ // ParTri_14 //
analyzed: sakṣāt paśyati asaṃdigdham ākṛṣṭam rudra śaktibhiḥ

original: praharadvayamātreṇa vyomastho jāyate smaran /
analyzed: prahara dvaya mātreṇa vyoma sthaḥ jāyate smaran

original: trayeṇa mātaraḥ sarvā yogeśvaryo mahābalāḥ // ParTri_15 //
analyzed: trayeṇa mātaraḥ sarvāḥ yoga īśvaryaḥ mahā balāḥ

original: vīrā vīreśvarāḥ siddhā balavāñ chākinīgaṇaḥ /
analyzed: vīrāḥ vīra īśvarāḥ siddhāḥ balavān śākinī gaṇaḥ

original: āgatya samayaṃ dattvā bhairaveṇa pracoditāḥ // ParTri_16 //
analyzed: āgatya samayam dattvā bhairaveṇa pracoditāḥ

original: yacchanti paramāṃ siddhiṃ phalaṃ yad vā samīhitam /
analyzed: yacchanti paramām siddhim phalam yat vā samīhitam

original: anena siddhāḥ setsyanti sādhayanti ca mantriṇaḥ // ParTri_17 //
analyzed: anena siddhāḥ setsyanti sādhayanti ca mantriṇaḥ

original: yat kiṃcid bhairave tantre sarvam asmāt prasiddhyati /
analyzed: yat kiṃcid bhairave tantre sarvam asmāt

original: adṛṣṭamaṇdalo 'py evaṃ yaḥ kaścid vetti tattvataḥ /
analyzed: adṛṣṭa maṇdalaḥ api evam yaḥ kaścid vetti tattvataḥ

original: sa siddhibhāg bhaven nityaṃ sa yogī sa ca dīkṣitaḥ // ParTri_18 //
analyzed: sa siddhi bhāj bhavet nityam sa yogī sa ca dīkṣitaḥ

original: anena jñātamātreṇa jñāyate sarvaśaktibhiḥ /
analyzed: anena jñāta mātreṇa jñāyate sarva śaktibhiḥ

original: śākinīkulasāmānyo bhaved yogaṃ vināpi hi // ParTri_19 //
analyzed: śākinī kula sāmānyaḥ bhavet yogam vinā api hi

original: avidhijño vidhānajño jāyate yajanaṃ prati // ParTri_20 //
analyzed: a vidhi jñaḥ vidhāna jñaḥ jāyate yajanam prati

original: kālāgnim āditaḥ kṛtvā māyāntam brahmadehagam /
analyzed: kālāgnim āditas kṛtvā māyā antam brahma deha gam

original: śivo viśvādyanantāntaḥ paraṃ śaktitrayaṃ matam // ParTri_21 //
analyzed: śivaḥ viśva ādi ananta antar param śakti trayam matam

original: tadantar varti yat kiṃcic chuddhamārge vyavasthitam /
analyzed: tad antar varti yat kiṃcid śuddha mārge vyavasthitam

original: aṇur viśuddham acirād aiśvaraṃ jñānam aśnute // ParTri_22 //
analyzed: aṇuḥ viśuddham acirāt aiśvaram jñānam aśnute

original: taccodakaḥ śivo jñeyaḥ sarvajñaḥ parameśvaraḥ /
analyzed: tad codakaḥ śivaḥ jñeyaḥ sarvajñaḥ parameśvaraḥ

original: sarvago nirmalaḥ svacchas tṛptaḥ svāyatanaḥ śuciḥ // ParTri_23 //
analyzed: sarvagaḥ nirmalaḥ svacchaḥ tṛptaḥ sva āyatanaḥ śuciḥ

original: yathā nyagrodhabījasthaḥ śaktirūpo mahādrumaḥ /
analyzed: yathā nyagrodha bīja sthaḥ śakti rūpaḥ mahā drumaḥ

original: tathā hṛdayabījasthaṃ jagad etac carācaram // ParTri_24 //
analyzed: tathā hṛdaya bīja stham jagat etat carācaram

original: evaṃ yo vetti tattvena tasya nirvāṇagāminī /
analyzed: evam yaḥ vetti tattvena tasya nirvāṇa gāminī

original: dīkṣā bhavaty asaṃdigdhā tilājyāhutivarjitā // ParTri_25 //
analyzed: dīkṣā bhavati asaṃdigdhā tila ājya āhuti varjitā

original: mūrdhni vaktre ca hṛdaye guhye mūrtau tathaiva ca /
analyzed: mūrdhni vaktre ca hṛdaye guhye mūrtau tathā eva ca

original: nyāsaṃ krtvā śikhāṃ baddhvā saptaviṃśatimantritām // ParTri_26 //
analyzed: nyāsam krtvā śikhām baddhvā saptaviṃśati mantritām

original: ekaikaṃ tu diśāṃ bandhaṃ daśānām api yojayet /
analyzed: ekaikam tu diśām bandham daśānām api yojayet

original: tālatrayam purā dattvā saśabdaṃ vighnaśāntaye // ParTri_27 //
analyzed: tāla trayam purā dattvā sa śabdam vighna śāntaye

original: śikhāsaṃkhyābhijaptena toyenābhyukṣayet tataḥ /
analyzed: śikhā saṃkhyā abhijaptena toyena abhyukṣayet tatas

original: puṣpādikaṃ kramāt sarvaṃ liṅge vā sthaṇḍile 'thavā // ParTri_28 //
analyzed: puṣpa ādikam kramāt sarvam liṅge vā sthaṇḍile

original: caturdaśābhijaptena puṣpeṇāsanakalpanā /
analyzed: caturdaśa abhijaptena puṣpeṇa āsana kalpanā

original: tatra sṛṣṭiṃ yajed vīraḥ punar evāsanaṃ tataḥ // ParTri_29 //
analyzed: tatra sṛṣṭim yajet vīraḥ punar eva āsanam tatas

original: sṛṣṭiṃ tu sampuṭīkṛtya paścād yajanam ārabhet /
analyzed: sṛṣṭim tu sampuṭīkṛtya paścāt yajanam ārabhet

original: sarvatattvasusampūrṇām sarvābharaṇabhūṣitām // ParTri_30 //
analyzed: sarva tattva su sampūrṇām sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitām

original: yajed devīṃ maheśānīṃ saptaviṃśatimantritām /
analyzed: yajet devīm maheśānīm saptaviṃśati mantritām

original: tataḥ sugandhipuṣpais tu yathāśaktyā samarcayet // ParTri_31 //
analyzed: tatas sugandhi puṣpaiḥ tu yathāśaktyā samarcayet

original: pūjayet parayā bhaktyā ātmanaṃ ca nivedayet /
analyzed: pūjayet parayā bhaktyā ātmanam ca nivedayet

original: evaṃ yajanam ākhyātam agnikārye 'py ayaṃ vidhiḥ // ParTri_32 //
analyzed: evam yajanam ākhyātam agni kārye pi ayam vidhiḥ

original: kṛtapūjāvidhiḥ samyak smaran bījaṃ prasiddhyati /
analyzed: kṛta pūjā vidhiḥ samyak smaran bījam prasiddhi ati

original: ādyantarahitaṃ bījaṃ vikasat tithimadhyagam /
analyzed: ādi anta rahitam bījam vikasat tithi madhya gam

original: hṛtpadmāntargataṃ dhyāyet somāṃśaṃ nityam abhyasyet // ParTri_33 //
evaṃ mantraphalāvāptir ity etad rudrayāmalam /
analyzed: evam mantra phala avāptiḥ iti etat rudrayāmalam

original: etad abhyāsataḥ siddhiḥ sarvajñatvam avāpyate // ParTri_35 //
analyzed: etat abhyāsataḥ siddhiḥ sarvajña tvam avāpyate
